nodes.text: Rescue 1 was a Rescue Boat used by Rescue Flight to free civilians held by the Trade Federation.

During the Invasion of Naboo, Rescue 1 participated in the in the rescue of prisoners from Trade Federation prison camps. Rescue 1, under the direction of Rescue Leader, freed the civilians from Camp Three. After rendezvousing with the other two Boats of Rescue Flight, Rescue 1 led the three to the Europa Islands. There, Rescue 1 transferred its passengers to the Mercatan which then transported them to safety.
